meanings.definition: Not done on purpose or intentionally.
meanings.sent1: The nondeliberate mistake was quickly forgiven.
meanings.sent2: Her nondeliberate smile brightened the room.
meanings.sent3: He made a nondeliberate joke that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The nondeliberate chaos in the kitchen resembled a tornado.
meanings.sent5: The nondeliberate decision to take a different route led to a beautiful discovery.

meanings.definition: Not the result of careful thought or planning.
meanings.sent1: The nondeliberate choice of colors created a unique painting.
meanings.sent2: His nondeliberate actions often surprised his friends.
meanings.sent3: The nondeliberate mix-up of ingredients made the dish taste strange.
meanings.sent4: The nondeliberate path she took led to unexpected adventures.
meanings.sent5: The nondeliberate arrangement of flowers looked surprisingly beautiful.
